content:
Posted: May 18, 2016
												Prison Tycoon Alcatraz is yet another corpse in the Prison Tycoon series that keeps on stinking up the morgue - which in this crap metaphor is Steam. The UI is awful, the graphics are atrocious, and the gameplay - once you've got your guards and prisoners and assigned jobs - consists of sitting around twiddling your thumbs. It's charmless and borderline unplayable if you have any concept of fun. If you want a decent prison game, might I suggest Prison Architect instead.

content:
Posted: August 30, 2016
												Although these negative comments are justified, I'd like to point out that when the game runs it is pretty much a blast to play. At first I thought I was playing just another "Typhoon" video game, but man once that music kicks in and you're running a prison like the god you are... it sends you into orbit. One thing that makes this game stand out is it's ability to help you loose weight. That's right! You'll be having so much fun playing, you'll plumb forget to eat at all! All this game needs is multiplayer. I'd love to compete with my many friends in online. Maybe I could even meet a nice girl while playing online. Her name is Dorris she's ma best girl I'm gonna marry someday. Well I gotta go. This game just finished downloading so I'm gonna go try it out!Good Luck
